name: Absent Mind
description: In Absent Mind, you are put in the place where you were born as you cross the bridge into the afterlife. The hospital was used as the bridge and it contains important items of your past.The hospital will decide your fate. Will you move on to the next life, or become a patient forever?
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i3 or AMD Phenom II X4 Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 550 or AMD Radeon R7 250 Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8 or Windows 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD FX-8300 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or AMD Radeon R9 270 Storage: 5 GB available space
